column4: I'm installing ubuntu server, I get the cdrom to boot, I choose "Install Ubuntu" and then says it can not mount the cdrom.  Is there any way around this?
did you use the check CD feature?
i don't really know, can you mount other CDs?
do you have any OS installed right now?
I'm going to be pulling the CDRom after install
Its currently primary master on the IDE chain
could be a problem with the CD player, but that's my only idea
but it reads enough to boot
maybe someone else can help you, i don
maybe someone else can help you, i don't know what would cause that*
